archimate:Assessment.name: SWIFT/PCI-DSS audits are already ongoing
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Robert:
"Driving audits: Martin Karolis (Banking) and myself (Connect). There are two parts to the Swift and PCI/DSS certifications: A) Providing Documentation (deadline 15.4) B) On site visit by auditors. For A) there is some doc overlap. For B relevant Connect staff need to be available to provide "proof" on different topics for the two certifications."
